article_title: The Fourth Circuit's Ruling In King v. Burwell Is Absurd And Should Be Set Aside

article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: The court based its entire ruling on the premise that the ACA defines federal Exchanges as “established by a State," a reading that achieves the trifecta of inverting the plain meaning of the text, creating absurd results, and creating surplusage.
